| **[Genocidable](/wiki/Genocide "Genocide")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              | No                                                                                                                                                            |

| **[Resistances](/wiki/Resistance "Resistance")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          | [fire](/wiki/Fire "Fire"), [cold](/wiki/Cold "Cold"), [shock](/wiki/Shock "Shock"), [poison](/wiki/Poison "Poison")                                           |
| **Resistances [conveyed](/wiki/Corpse "Corpse")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                         | [poison](/wiki/Poison "Poison")                                                                                                                               |
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                           |                                                                                                                                                               |
| Garland:* has [a head, a couple of arms, and a torso](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").
* is [omnivorous](/wiki/Omnivore "Omnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is a [human](/wiki/Human_\(monster_attribute\) "Human (monster attribute)").
* is male.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* can pick up weapons and food.
* waits for you to come.
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* [never leaves a corpse](/wiki/Corpseless "Corpseless").
* may [turn against you](/wiki/Treachery "Treachery") when tame. |                                                                                                                                                               |
html:
Garland

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
@ Garland
Difficulty 12
Attacks Weapon 1d6 physical, Weapon 1d6 physical, Passive 0d0 spawn Chaos
@ Garland
Difficulty 12
Attacks

Weapon 1d6 physical, Weapon 1d6 physical, Passive 0d0 spawn Chaos

Base level 9
Base experience 199
Speed 16
Base AC 10
Base MR 9
Alignment -6 (chaotic)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable No
Weight 1450
Nutritional value 400
Size medium
Resistances fire, cold, shock, poison
Resistances conveyed poison

Garland:

  • has a head, a couple of arms, and a torso.
  • is omnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a human.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • can pick up weapons and food.
  • waits for you to come.
  • can be seen through infravision.
  • never leaves a corpse.
  • may turn against you when tame.

Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Garland&oldid=131475"
